titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation commanding the use of the Book of Common-Prayer according to law notwithstanding the pretended ordinances for the new directory.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, this thirteenth day of November, in the one and twentieth yeare of Our Reigne. 1645.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
